PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Realizadas na Semana
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO and A.DATACONCLUSAO BETWEEN @SEMANA[1] AND @SEMANA[2] </CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividades</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Realizadas na Semana</Description> <Icon>fa fa-cog fa-spin</Icon> <Color>green-jungle</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Pendentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < @HOJE</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesPendentes</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Pendentes</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>red</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades para hoje
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO >= DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE()),0) AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO < DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesHoje</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades para hoje</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>yellow-gold</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atividades Futuras
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 1 AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATACONCLUSAO IS NULL AND A.DATAAGENDAMENTO > DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day,0,GETDATE())+1,0)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdAtividadesFuturas</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Futuras</Description> <Icon>fa fa-line-chart</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Minhas Contas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAVERTICAL.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIOEXECUTIVO = @USUARIO</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MINHAS_CONTAS</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Minhas Verticais</Description> <Icon>fa fa-list-alt</Icon> <Color>purple</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Minhas Oportunidades
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.STATUSOPORTUNIDADE NOT IN (7,14,15,16,17,18)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MINHAS_CONTAS</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Minhas Oportunidades</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>green-haze</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Vencidas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.DATAFECHAMENTO < GETDATE() AND A.STATUSOPORTUNIDADE NOT IN (7,14,15,16,17,18,19,20)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MINHAS_CONTAS_VENCIDAS</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Vencidas</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>red-pink</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Atendimentos em Aberto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_CHAMADOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIOINCLUSAO = @USUARIO AND A.STATUS IN (1)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MEUS_CHAMADOS</CommandName> <Value>HANDLE</Value> <Description>Suportes em Aberto</Description> <Icon>fa fa-list</Icon> <Color>blue</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Minhas Contas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_TAREFAUSUARIO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.TAREFA IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'Contato realizado Minha Benner') AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO</CriteriaWhereClause> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Atividades Minha Benner</Description> <Icon>fa fa-calendar-check-o</Icon> <Color>blue-steel</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Solicitações de desconto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PO_DESCONTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 2</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_EXECUTIVO</CommandName> <Value>OPORTUNIDADE</Value> <Description>Solicitações de desconto</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>green-jungle</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meus Semafóros
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOASEMAFORO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.EXECUTIVOCONTAS = @USUARIO</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_MEUSEMAFORO</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Meus Semafóros</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>blue-hoki</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meta Anual
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_META_VENDA_V1_TRI.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue>A.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL) ) AND YEAR(A.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL) ) AND YEAR(A.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <Status>PLANEJADO_MONEY</Status> <TotalValue>PLANEJADO</TotalValue> <ValueFormat>C</ValueFormat> <Value>REALIZADO</Value> <Description>Meta Anual</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>2</ValueAggregation> <TileType>2</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meta Trimestral
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_META_VENDA_V1_TRI.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue>A.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL) ) AND DATEPART(QUARTER,A.DATA) = DATEPART(QUARTER,GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL) ) AND DATEPART(QUARTER,A.DATA) = DATEPART(QUARTER,GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <Status>PLANEJADO_MONEY</Status> <TotalValue>PLANEJADO</TotalValue> <ValueFormat>C</ValueFormat> <Value>REALIZADO</Value> <Description>Meta Trimestral</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>2</ValueAggregation> <TileType>2</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Calendário Usuário
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <ActionViewAttributes> <Controller>CalendarioCrm</Controller> <Action>CalendarioUsuario</Action> </ActionViewAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Meta Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_META_VENDA_V1_TRI.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue>A.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL) ) AND MONTH(A.DATA) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(A.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClauseTotalValue> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND YEAR(C.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND B.FILIAL <> @FILIAL) ) AND MONTH(A.DATA) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(A.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <Status>PLANEJADO_MONEY</Status> <TotalValue>PLANEJADO</TotalValue> <ValueFormat>C</ValueFormat> <Value>REALIZADO</Value> <Description>Meta Mês</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>green</Color> <ValueAggregation>2</ValueAggregation> <TileType>2</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Temperatura / Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_V1_TEMPERATURA.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>600</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Fase / Valor
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_V1_FUNIL_FASE_VALOR.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>B.PUBLICOPRIVADO = 2 AND B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Fase / Valor
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_V1_FUNIL_FASE_VALOR.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>B.PUBLICOPRIVADO = 1 AND B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Origem / Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_V1_ORIGEM.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>200</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Vertical / Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_V1_VERTICAL.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>D.STATUS= 1 AND B.PERDE = 'N' AND B.GANHA = 'N' AND B.CANCELA= 'N' AND B.SUSPENDE= 'N' AND ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>200</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Perdidos / Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_GRAPH_V1_PERDIDO.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause> ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL <> @FILIAL)) AND A.RESPONSAVEL = @USUARIO </CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>200</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>
